p: Tested DENV specific antibodies IgG and IgM in plasma samples were obtained from screened patients by ELISA antigen enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay (ELISA, Focus Technologies, Cypress, Ca, USA) [ 20]. Positive IgM cases were serologically confirmed by ELISA. Moreover, DV antigen and viral RNA were detected by a dot blot immunoassay and a dengue serotype specific reverse transcription PCR [ 23].
